ComicInfo.Summary:
Modi Tyrson faces the one thing a big, strapping young Viking dreads: women problems! From the deadly dilemma posed by a gang of seductive Water Witches to a bone-crushing confrontation with a single, renegade Valkyrie, Modi is challenged by one angry female after another. What is a Viking to do? And if that's not enough trouble, Loki, the God of Lies, in on hand to dole out advice and guidance to the young hero. This is bound to be educational! Witches, gods, giants, Valkyries, and armies of berserker warriors are all on hand to turn Modi away from his ultimate goal: entrance to Asgard and a chance to go mano-a- mano with Thorr himself! This issue displays a striking cover by Adam Hughes with what might just be the bloodiest comic book cover image of all time!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/hammer-of-the-gods-3-falling-for-gods/4000-118804/
ComicInfo.Title: Falling for Gods!
